name: Famous Courses of the World: Vol. II
description:
This add-on to World Class Leader Board features three famous courses along with a fourth course designed specifically for this program. Each hole authentically reproduces the distance, traps, trees, rough and water hazards of Pebble Beach Golf Links (Pebble Beach, California, USA), Muirfield (Gullane, East Lothian, Scotland), Colonial Country Club (Fort Worth, Texas, USA) and also included is the "World Class" course of Glenmoor Country Club (Canton, Ohio, USA), which was designed to be the most difficult and challenging course in this series.

New features over the original include a special Punch Slot feature for pitch and run shots, and the ability to shoot under trees!

The UK (U.S. Gold) release courses are that from the original US release of Famous Courses of the World: Vol. I.
